overview: The revealing twisted road from desire to pursuit and surrender. All of the scenes are scorching with great buildup in the art of seduction and sensuality. Julia Ann, Trinity St. Claire, Jelena Jensen, and Sarah Shevon have two amazing scenes, followed by a blazin' second half starring Nicole Moore, Tanner Mayes, Brenda James, and Brooke Lee Adams!
tagline: Their Only Sin Is Unconventional Love
title: Lesbian Seductions: Older/Younger 38
